edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.bullet

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.bullet.Bullet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarrierBullet, DarknessBullet, EnemyBullet, LaserBullet, PlayerLaunchedBullet

    public class Bullet
extends java.lang.Object
    A Bullet is a basic element present in the game. They either are employed by enemies to attack the player, or by the player to attack enemies.
    Author:
    bowenzhi

      • Bullet

        public Bullet(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float location,
      float velocity,
      java.awt.Dimension hitbox,
      com.sun.opengl.util.texture.Texture sprite,
      java.awt.Dimension spriteSize,
      boolean lockAngle,
      boolean offScreenDelete)
        Generalized constructor
        Parameters:
        location - Starting location
        velocity - Starting velocity
        acceleration - Acceleration
        airFric - Air friction
        hitbox - Hitbox dimenisons and size
        sprite - Sprite (if null, just draws an oval around the size
        spriteSize - Size of the sprite
        lockAngle - determines whether or not to calculate the angle the bullet is moving in for sprite animations

        velocity - Starting velocity
        acceleration - Acceleration
        airFric - Air friction
        shape - Shape of the bullet
        c - Color of the bullet
        lockAngle - determines whether or not to calculate the angle the bullet is moving in for sprite animations

        public void drawNoBind(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
        Draws this Bullet without binding the texture (for efficiency purposes, it is advantageous to bind the texture once and draw all bullets of that texture
